text: Brigg is a small market town in North Lincolnshire, England. In 2001, it was shown that the population of Brigg was 5,076 in 2,213 households.http://www.neighbourhood.statistics.gov.uk/dissemination/LeadTableView.do?a=3&b;=791109&c;=brigg&d;=16&e;=15&g;=392208&i;=1001x1003x1004&m;=0&r;=1&s;=1304172305105&enc;=1&dsFamilyId;=779 == References == Category:Towns in Lincolnshire
title: Brigg
